query.label: Реализация товара
Реализация по датам
Реализация по видам товаров
query.sql: select product.classid, get_full_name(max(class.fullname), max(class.name)) as class, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit) as cnt, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.price)) as outsum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.ndsprice)) as outndssum, sum(doc_prod.nalogsum) as nalogsum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inprice) as insum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inndsprice) as inndssum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.ndsprice) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.inndsprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum2, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum, safe_div(sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.price - doc_prod.inprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) * 100, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice)) as ostper, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * product.weight) as weight from doc doc1 join doc_prod on doc_prod.docid=doc1.docid /*$if clientid1*/ left join doc doc2 on doc2.docid=doc_prod.indocid /*$endif*/ left join product on product.prodid=doc_prod.prodid left join class on class.classid=product.classid where doc1.clientid1=:clientid and doc1.kind=1 /*$if clientid1*/ and doc2.clientid1=:clientid1 /*$endif*/ /*$if clientid2*/ and doc1.clientid2=:clientid2 /*$endif*/ /*$if date1*/ and doc1.date1>=:date1 /*$endif*/ /*$if date2*/ and doc1.date1<=:date2 /*$endif*/ /*$if prodid*/ and doc_prod.prodid=:prodid /*$endif*/ /*$if classid*/ and product.classid=:classid /*$endif*/ /*$if produserid*/ and product.produserid=:produserid /*$endif*/ group by product.classid order by 4 desc

query.label: Реализация по производителям
query.sql: select product.produserid, get_full_name(max(produser.fullname), max(produser.name)) as produser, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit) as cnt, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.price)) as outsum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.ndsprice)) as outndssum, sum(doc_prod.nalogsum) as nalogsum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inprice) as insum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inndsprice) as inndssum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.ndsprice) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.inndsprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum2, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum, safe_div(sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.price - doc_prod.inprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) * 100, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice)) as ostper, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * product.weight) as weight from doc doc1 join doc_prod on doc_prod.docid=doc1.docid /*$if clientid1*/ left join doc doc2 on doc2.docid=doc_prod.indocid /*$endif*/ left join product on product.prodid=doc_prod.prodid left join produser on produser.produserid=product.produserid where doc1.clientid1=:clientid and doc1.kind=1 /*$if clientid1*/ and doc2.clientid1=:clientid1 /*$endif*/ /*$if clientid2*/ and doc1.clientid2=:clientid2 /*$endif*/ /*$if date1*/ and doc1.date1>=:date1 /*$endif*/ /*$if date2*/ and doc1.date1<=:date2 /*$endif*/ /*$if prodid*/ and doc_prod.prodid=:prodid /*$endif*/ /*$if classid*/ and product.classid=:classid /*$endif*/ /*$if produserid*/ and product.produserid=:produserid /*$endif*/ group by product.produserid order by 4 desc

query.label: Реализация по товарам
query.sql: select product.prodid, cast(get_product_name(max(product.name), max(class.smallname), max(produser.smallname), max(product.len)) as varchar(100)) product, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit) as cnt, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.price)) as outsum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.ndsprice)) as outndssum, sum(doc_prod.nalogsum) as nalogsum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inprice) as insum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inndsprice) as inndssum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.ndsprice) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.inndsprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum2, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum, safe_div(sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.price - doc_prod.inprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) * 100, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice)) as ostper, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * product.weight) as weight from doc doc1 join doc_prod on doc_prod.docid=doc1.docid /*$if clientid1*/ left join doc doc2 on doc2.docid=doc_prod.indocid /*$endif*/ left join product on product.prodid=doc_prod.prodid left join class on class.classid=product.classid left join produser on produser.produserid=product.produserid where doc1.clientid1=:clientid and doc1.kind=1 /*$if clientid1*/ and doc2.clientid1=:clientid1 /*$endif*/ /*$if clientid2*/ and doc1.clientid2=:clientid2 /*$endif*/ /*$if date1*/ and doc1.date1>=:date1 /*$endif*/ /*$if date2*/ and doc1.date1<=:date2 /*$endif*/ /*$if prodid*/ and doc_prod.prodid=:prodid /*$endif*/ /*$if classid*/ and product.classid=:classid /*$endif*/ /*$if produserid*/ and product.produserid=:produserid /*$endif*/ group by product.prodid order by 4 desc

query.label: Реализация по покупателям
query.sql: select doc1.clientid2, get_full_name(max(client.fullname), max(client.name)) as client2, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit) as cnt, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.price)) as outsum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.ndsprice)) as outndssum, sum(doc_prod.nalogsum) as nalogsum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inprice) as insum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inndsprice) as inndssum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.ndsprice) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.inndsprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum2, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum, safe_div(sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.price - doc_prod.inprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) * 100, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice)) as ostper, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * product.weight) as weight from doc doc1 join doc_prod on doc_prod.docid=doc1.docid /*$if clientid1*/ left join doc doc2 on doc2.docid=doc_prod.indocid /*$endif*/ left join client on client.clientid=doc1.clientid2 left join product on product.prodid=doc_prod.prodid where doc1.clientid1=:clientid and doc1.kind=1 /*$if clientid1*/ and doc2.clientid1=:clientid1 /*$endif*/ /*$if clientid2*/ and doc1.clientid2=:clientid2 /*$endif*/ /*$if date1*/ and doc1.date1>=:date1 /*$endif*/ /*$if date2*/ and doc1.date1<=:date2 /*$endif*/ /*$if prodid*/ and doc_prod.prodid=:prodid /*$endif*/ /*$if classid*/ and product.classid=:classid /*$endif*/ /*$if produserid*/ and product.produserid=:produserid /*$endif*/ group by doc1.clientid2 order by 4 desc

query.label: Реализация по поставщикам
query.sql: select doc2.clientid1, get_full_name(max(client.fullname), max(client.name)) as client1, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit) as cnt, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.price)) as outsum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.ndsprice)) as outndssum, sum(doc_prod.nalogsum) as nalogsum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inprice) as insum, sum(doc_prod.cnt*doc_prod.unit*doc_prod.inndsprice) as inndssum, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.ndsprice) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.inndsprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum2, sum(round_curr(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.price) - doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice - doc_prod.nalogsum) as ostsum, safe_div(sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * (doc_prod.price - doc_prod.inprice) - doc_prod.nalogsum) * 100, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * doc_prod.inprice)) as ostper, sum(doc_prod.cnt * doc_prod.unit * product.weight) as weight from doc doc1 join doc_prod on doc_prod.docid=doc1.docid left join doc doc2 on doc2.docid=doc_prod.indocid left join client on client.clientid=doc2.clientid1 left join product on product.prodid=doc_prod.prodid where doc1.clientid1=:clientid and doc1.kind=1 /*$if clientid1*/ and doc2.clientid1=:clientid1 /*$endif*/ /*$if clientid2*/ and doc1.clientid2=:clientid2 /*$endif*/ /*$if date1*/ and doc1.date1>=:date1 /*$endif*/ /*$if date2*/ and doc1.date1<=:date2 /*$endif*/ /*$if prodid*/ and doc_prod.prodid=:prodid /*$endif*/ /*$if classid*/ and product.classid=:classid /*$endif*/ /*$if produserid*/ and product.produserid=:produserid /*$endif*/ group by doc2.clientid1 order by 4 desc

query.label: Приход товара
Приход по датам
Приход по поставщикам
Остаток товара
query.sql: select class.name class, produser.name produser, product.name, get_product_name(product.name, class.smallname, produser.smallname, product.len) product, qry.unit, qry.cnt, qry.cnt * qry.unit allcnt, qry.inprice, qry.outprice, qry.inprice * qry.unit * qry.cnt ostsum, get_doc_name(doc.kind, doc.skind, doc.docno, doc.date1, doc.sum0) doc from query_ostatok2(:clientid, null, null, :date2) qry left join doc on doc.docid = qry.indocid left join product on product.prodid = qry.prodid left join class on class.classid = product.classid left join produser on produser.produserid = product.produserid where (cnt < -0.00001 OR cnt > 0.00001) /*$if clientid1*/ and doc.clientid1=:clientid1 /*$endif*/ /*$if prodid*/ and qry.prodid=:prodid /*$endif*/ /*$if classid*/ and product.classid=:classid /*$endif*/ /*$if produserid*/ and product.produserid=:produserid /*$endif*/ order by 1, 2, 3
